de.esoco.gwt.client.ui

Class DataElementListUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.gwt.client.ui.DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DataElementList>
      • de.esoco.gwt.client.ui.DataElementListUI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityDataElementUI

    public class DataElementListUI
extends DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DataElementList>
    A data element user interface that manages a DataElementList data element in a child panel manager.

      • collectInput

        public void collectInput(java.util.List<de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>> rModifiedElements)
        This method must be invoked externally to collect the values from an input user interface into the associated data element. Only after this will the data element contain any new values that have been input by the user. If this instance is not for input the call will be ignored. Therefore it won't harm to invoke this method on display user interfaces too.
        Overrides:
        collectInput in class DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DataElementList>
        Parameters:
        rModifiedElements - A list to add modified data elements to

      • enableInteraction

        protected void enableInteraction(boolean bEnable)
        Description copied from class: DataElementUI
        Enables or disables interactions through this panel manager's user interface. This default implementation stores the current enabled state and then disables or restores the enabled state of the element component through the method DataElementUI.enableComponent(boolean).
        Overrides:
        enableInteraction in class DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DataElementList>
        Parameters:
        bEnable - TRUE to enable interaction, FALSE to disable
        See Also:
        DataElementUI.enableInteraction(boolean)
